title: Gene Deitch: picture book animated
creator_credit: Gene Deitch, Morton Schindel and Weston Woods Studios
brief_description: Picture book animator for Weston Woods Studios Gene Deitch, shares his insights into the purpose, art and technique of adapting, as animated films, outstanding picture books such as ‘Where the Wild Things Are’. Shows Deitch and his wife Zdenka, in Prague where they live and work.
